author: Dom Peppiatt
description:
It's Gamescom Opening Night Live time, and that means Geoff Keighley's back and ready to dish out loads of gaming news and information. As part of the presentation, Keighley and the crew behind Opening Night Live took to the stage with brand-new trailers, announcements, reveals, and more, kicking off this year's Gamescom in Germany. You'll find a complete list of everything announced during the showcase below.

Read more
title: Everything announced at Opening Night Live, Gamescom 2025

author: Matt Wales
description:
Ghost of Yōtei is almost upon us, and ahead of its 2nd October arrival, developer Insomniac has confirmed its highly anticipated sequel is getting its own co-op-focused Legends mode as free post-launch DLC next year.

Read more
title: Ghost of Yōtei is getting its own co-op Legends mode as free post-launch DLC

author: Ed Nightingale
description:
Black Myth: Wukong studio Game Science has revealed it's working on the next game in the series.

Read more
title: New Black Myth game announced by Game Science, following Wukong success

author: Robert Purchese
description:
As Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 finally gets a release date it looks like it will hit - 21st October 2025 - so comes news you'll have to pay to access two of the six clans in the game. Clans here act like your character class, determining what kind of gameplay role your character will adopt, as well as giving you a sense of storied belonging in the world, so they're no trivial thing. And they're not cheap.

Read more
title: This sucks: you'll have to pay for two clans in Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2

author: Robert Purchese
description:
The long-awaited and much-troubled Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 will finally be released on 21st October 2025, Paradox has announced. It's coming to PC, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series S/X simultaneously.

Read more
title: After all these years, Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 gets an actual proper release date

author: Victoria Phillips Kennedy
description:
The teams at 11 bit studios and Digital Sun have announced Moonlighter 2: The Endless Vault will be heading into early access via Steam on 23rd October.

Read more
title: Moonlighter 2 plops players back into the shoes of adventurous shopkeeper Will with early access release date

author: Connor Makar
description:
Zero Parades has been announced, the next game by ZA/UM. That studio has undergone a drastic amount of staffing changes over the years, but it's the development studio that created Disco Elysium.

Read more
title: Zero Parades is the next game by Disco Elysium dev ZA/UM, revealed at Gamescom Opening Night Live

author: Matt Wales
description:
After a whole lot of waiting, the second season of Amazon Prime's acclaimed live-action Fallout adaptation finally has an air date. It hits the streaming service on 17th December, and the news is accompanied by a brand-new trailer offering some glimpses of what's in store, including a very familiar moustache.

Read more
title: Fallout season two gets a release date and a brand-new trailer featuring a New Vegas favourite

author: Ed Nightingale
description:
Indiana Jones and the Great Circle will be released on Nintendo's Switch 2 console next year.

Read more
title: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle is coming to Switch 2 next year

author: Ed Nightingale
description:
Monster Hunter Wilds and Final Fantasy 14 are collaborating with crossover content in both games.

Read more
title: Monster Hunter Wilds and Final Fantasy 14 are collaborating

author: Matt Wales
description:
Just when the world needs him most, the caped crusader returns - albeit in tiny plastic form. Yes, the Lego Batman series is back in Legacy of the Dark Knight and it's coming to Xbox Series X/S, PlayStation 5, Switch 2, and PC next year.

Read more
title: Lego Batman is back in Legacy of the Dark Knight and it's out next year

author: Chris Tapsell
description:
Eight years after the release of the audacious, but ill-fated Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War 3, we finally have a sequel. Dawn of War 4 is coming, with a slated release of some time in 2026. Only it's not coming from the original developer Relic; instead German studio KING Art Games is at the helm.

Read more
title: Warhammer 40K: Dawn of War 4 announced, and it's coming from a surprise new developer next year

author: Ed Nightingale
description:
FromSoftware's ultra hard Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice is being adapted into an anime.

Read more
title: Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice is getting an anime adaptation

author: Connor Makar
description:
Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 just got a fresh new trailer at Gamescom Opening Night live. The trailer, packed full of new maps, mind-bending gameplay, and big robots. The game is set to release on 14th November.

Read more
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 releases 14th November

author: Connor Makar
description:
Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 will have an open beta starting on 2nd October for those who pre-order the game or subscribe to Game Pass Ultimate, Game Pass PC, or Game Pass Console. For those who don't pre-order, the open beta begins on 5th October.

Read more
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 open beta starts 2nd October

author: Reece Bithrey
description: At a very warm Gamescom-adjacent event this Tuesday evening, Sony has unveiled some real firsts for their Inzone range of gaming peripherals. The gaming sub-brand first came to light in 2022 with a range of stylish gaming headsets, and this was joined by some impressively designed gaming monitors, including 2024's Inzone M10 S and M9 2 models. Sony's Gamescom 2025 announcements go much further, with an entire ecosystem of PC peripherals, including an ANC-equipped flagship gaming headset, plus the brand's first keyboard, mouse, wired in-ear headset and mouse pad(s).
title: Sony just revealed its first mouse and keyboard, part of a full set of PC peripherals

author: Robert Purchese
description:
It's Gamescom Opening Night Live time, which means Geoff Keighley's back with a probably slightly too long broadcast, containing, we hope, some exciting game announcements. I'll be joined in the commentary box by Tom Orry and we'll be watching the broadcast and bringing you a blow-by-blow account of it, right here. We also have a number of our team there at the show, so maybe they'll cause some mischief in the auditorium as we watch.

Read more
title: Gamescom Opening Night Live 2025 livestream and blog

author: Matt Wales
description:
BioShock 4 developer Cloud Chamber is reportedly laying off an "unspecified" number of employees. The news comes as former Diablo boss Rod Fergusson joins as new studio head following claims of development "turmoil".

Read more
title: BioShock 4 studio reportedly facing layoffs as former Diablo boss takes over amid "development turmoil"

author: Ed Nightingale
description:
Monster Hunter Wilds PC players are finally set to receive proper optimisation for the game's performance issues, but Capcom has stated it won't arrive until this winter. That's almost a year after the game was released.

Read more
title: As Monster Hunter Wilds PC players wait almost a year for better performance, Capcom is in danger of losing its most important audience

author: Ed Nightingale
description:
Nintendo has unveiled Kirby Air Riders in a new Direct presentation, following a brief trailer back in April. The game is set for release on 20th November this year on Switch 2.

Read more
title: Kirby Air Riders' grand Direct unveiling was classic Sakurai, as he jokes it's not another Mario Kart clone

author: Tom Orry
description:
A Hollow Knight: Silksong "Special Announcement" from developer Team Cherry is planned for Thursday, with the video set to run on YouTube at 3.30pm BST on 21st August.

Read more
title: No Hollow Knight: Silksong release date announcement today as Special Announcement is scheduled for Thursday

author: Tom Orry
description:
Xbox has announced the games coming to Xbox consoles and PC on Game Pass. The line-up for the second half of August includes big names such as Persona 4 Golden, Gears of War: Reloaded, and Dragon Age: The Veilguard. Neat looking indie game, Herdling, is also arriving day one on Game Pass.

Read more
title: Here are your Xbox Game Pass games for the end of August

author: Tom Orry
description:
Nintendo has announced that Kirby Air Riders will release on 20th November. The game is an exclusive for the Nintendo Switch 2, and is a sort of follow-up to Kirby Air Ride, a GameCube game from 2003 that has gained a cult following in the years since. The new game is being developed by Bandai Namco and Sora.

Read more
title: Switch 2 exclusive Kirby Air Riders has a release date and it's just three months away

author: Matt Wales
description:
Ahead of Helldivers 2's arrival on Xbox Series X/S next week, Arrowhead Game Studios has revealed a Halo-themed Legendary Warbond - featuring a range of familiar equipment - that's heading to PS5 and PC too.

Read more
title: Helldivers 2 hits Xbox next week with a Halo-themed Warbond coming to PS5 and PC too

author: Matt Wales
description:
It's been a busy couple of week in Nintendo presentation land. First we had that third-party-focused partner showcase, then it was the turn of the indies, leaving everyone to speculate that a proper Direct showcase much surely be on the way. And, well, here we are, sort of. Today's 45-minute Direct is apparently focused exclusively on Switch 2's upcoming Kirby Air Riders - and if that appeals, here's where you'll be able to watch it unfold.

Read m
title: Watch today's Kirby Air Riders Direct here

author: Tom Orry
description:
The games set to leave PlayStation Plus Extra in September have been revealed. The eight titles include some very good games, so you might want to make some time before 16th September to get them played.

Read more
title: Eight games, including an overlooked Metroidvania, will leave PlayStation Plus in September

author: Victoria Phillips Kennedy
description:
Gears of War creator Cliff 'CliffyB' Bleszinski is "thrilled" more people will be able to experience the original game when it arrives on PlayStation.

Read more
title: Gears of War creator Cliff Bleszinski "thrilled" about seeing his once Xbox exclusive on PlayStation

author: Tom Orry
description:
Hollow Knight: Silksong looks increasingly likely to be shown off in some form this evening at Gamescom Opening Night Live. Show host and producer Geoff Keighley tweeted a selfie while wearing a red nose, heavily pointing towards the game showing up at ONL tonight.

Read more
title: Hollow Knight: Silksong teased for a re-reveal at Gamescom Opening Night Live today

author: Tom Orry
description:
PC gamers who are hoping Capcom updates Monster Hunter Wilds to improve performance will have to wait a little longer. A statement made on X.com via the official Monster Hunter account has told players that improvements are coming, but not until this winter.

Read more
title: Capcom asks PC Monster Hunter Wilds players to wait until Title Update 4 this winter for "CPU and GPU related optimizations"
